task-wr.title: Displaying Provider Network Information Using the CLI
task-wr.shortdesc: You can display information about provider networks from the CLI.

context.p: US75601 separate CLI topic spawned.To view information for a provider network from the CLI, use the following command:
where providernet is the name or UUID of the provider network.
context.draft-comment: Need to create output to match screen shot. Output may need updating for VLAN Transparent info (US60634)

Add commands for viewing seg ranges and tenant networks associated with the provider network (as shown in the GUI display)? This is outside the scope of US55723, but appropriate for this new topic, which was created because of it. The Install Guide has this info in Configuring Provider Networks (and [same] Using the CLI).
context.p: You can use the following command to retrieve the names of the provider networks:
